name: Perfect Makeup 3D
description:
Welcome to the world of amazing transformation! Some people really need a stylist.

Some people really need a stylist.
This is you who will help them out and will win their hearts!
In our game you can make a diverse make-up for completely different people, receive rewards for this and see the sincere emotions of people who are grateful to you for your work.
Choose brushes, various colors and shades!
Change different colors of lipstick, eye-liner and powder to achieve an excellent look.
Be the best stylist, open your own salon!
